thread.title: Heat’s Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures
thread.title_full: Heat’s Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures

author: wtopstaff
title: Heat’s Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures
text:
Home » News » Sports » NBA » Heat's Green fined $25,000… Heat’s Green fined $25,000 by NBA for menacing gestures By The Associated Press October 23, 2015 6:06 pm Miami Heat guard Gerald Green (14) celebrates after scoring against the Washington Wizards in the second half of an NBA preseason basketball game, Wednesday, Oct. 21, 2015, in Miami. The Heat won 110-105. (AP Photo/Alan Diaz) 
NEW YORK (AP) — Miami Heat guard Gerald Green was fined $25,000 by the NBA on Friday for making menacing gestures in an exhibition game. 
The incidents occurred with 5:33 and 5:12 left in Miami’s 110-105 victory over Washington on Wednesday night. Green scored 28 points in the game. Topics:
